name: Fun Ball Paint Drop
description:
Fun Ball Paint Drop is new endless game of fun with beautiful art style to paint the round tower. Can you is ready to shoot the paint balls with splash of drops of colors. You just have to tap on the screen to start your cannon to shoot the painting balls and color the round table with different color schemes. Moving black steel rods are the big hurdles in your way while painting the white space on the board. Paint one board and drive ahead to the next board and start shooting with full energy. Hold for more fun while painting colorful designs but stay away from obstacles and enjoy extreme fun paint. Let's test your reflections and see how far can you go while painting fun all the way.
Features:
- One-tap addictive arcade game.
- Tap to paint. Hold for more fun.
- Stay away from obstacles.
- More Levels
- Bonus Levels
- Various Characters.
